Subroutine vom_hourly_init

884 : 
885 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
886 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
887 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
888 : 
889 :       subroutine vom_hourly_init ()
890 :       use vegmod
891 :       use vegwatmod
892 :       use watmod
893 :       implicit none
894 : 
895 :       INTEGER :: ii
896 : 
897 :       ii        = d___ * 24 + h__ - 24
898 :       rain_     = rainh(ii)
899 :       gammastar = gammastarvec(ii)
900 :       tair      = tairh(ii)
901 :       vd__      = vdh(ii)
902 :       par_      = parh(ii)
903 :       ca_       = cah(ii) / 1.0d6
904 : 
905 : !     * (Out[310], derived from (3.26)) Temperature dependence of Jmax
906 :       jmax__(:) = (E__ ** ((ha_ * (-25.d0 + tair) * (-273.d0 + topt_   &
907 :      &          + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_)) / ((25.d0 + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_) &
908 :      &          * (tair + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_))) * ((-1.d0 + E__ ** (-(hd &
909 :      &          * (-298.d0 + topt_)) / (25.d0 + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_)))  &
910 :      &          * ha_ + hd) * jmax25_(:)) / ((-1.d0 + E__ ** ((hd * (273.d0 &
911 :      &          + tair - topt_)) / (tair + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_))) * ha_ + hd)
912 :       rl__(:) = ((ca_ - gammastar) * pc_ * jmax__(:) * rlratio) / (4.d0 &
913 :      &        * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) * (1.d0 + rlratio))  ! (3.24), (Out[312])
914 : !     * (Out[310], derived from (3.26)) Temperature dependence of Jmax
915 :       jmaxg__(:) = (E__ ** ((ha_ * (-25.d0 + tair) * (-273.d0 + topt_  &
916 :      &           + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_)) / ((25.d0 + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_) &
917 :      &           * (tair + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_))) * ((-1.d0 + E__ ** (-(hd &
918 :      &           * (-298.d0 + topt_)) / (25.d0 + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_))) &
919 :      &           * ha_ + hd) * jmax25g(:)) / ((-1.d0 + E__ ** ((hd * (273.d0 &
920 :      &           + tair - topt_)) / (tair + 273.d0 * R__ * topt_))) * ha_ + hd)
921 :       rlg__(1,:) = ((ca_ - gammastar) * pcg_(1) * jmaxg__(:) * rlratio) &
922 :      &           / (4.d0 * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) * (1.d0 + rlratio))  ! (3.24), (Out[312])
923 :       rlg__(2,:) = ((ca_ - gammastar) * pcg_(2) * jmaxg__(:) * rlratio) &
924 :      &           / (4.d0 * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) * (1.d0 + rlratio))  ! (3.24), (Out[312])
925 :       rlg__(3,:) = ((ca_ - gammastar) * pcg_(3) * jmaxg__(:) * rlratio) &
926 :      &           / (4.d0 * (ca_ + 2.d0 * gammastar) * (1.d0 + rlratio))  ! (3.24), (Out[312])
927 : 
928 : !     * daily recalculation for resultsdaily
929 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
930 :         rainvec(d___) = rainvec(d___) + rain_ * 3600.d0 * 1000.d0  ! mm/d
931 :         parvec(d___)  = parvec(d___) + par_ * 3600.d0  ! in mol/m2/d
932 :         srad(d___)    = parvec(d___) / 2.0804d0  ! MJ/m2/d
933 : 
934 :         if (tair .gt. tmax(d___)) tmax(d___) = tair
935 :         if (tair .lt. tmin(d___)) tmin(d___) = tair
936 :       endif
937 : 
938 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
939 :         mqold   = mqnew
940 :         hspgfcf = 0.d0
941 :         hinf_   = 0.d0
942 :         hinfx   = 0.d0
943 :         hio     = 0.d0
944 :         hesoil  = 0.d0
945 :         hetm_   = 0.d0
946 :         hetmg   = 0.d0
947 :         hruptk_ = 0.d0
948 :       endif
949 : 
950 :       time         = 0.d0
951 :       hass_(:)     = 0.d0                    ! hourly assimilation
952 :       hassg(:,:)   = 0.d0
953 :       hruptkvec(:) = 0.d0
954 :       hruptkg(:)   = 0.d0
955 : 
956 :       return
957 :       end subroutine vom_hourly_init
